front.title: An overview of the U.S. approach to standards, conformity assessment and metrology

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.).

front.abstract: The U.S. standards and conformity assessment system is complex and involves cooperation between the Government and private sector. This CD-ROM provides an overview of the roles and responsibilities of those involved in the U.S. system. It addresses standards, conformity assessment and metrology concepts and lays out the means by which the U.S. system interfaces with the international community. NISTIR 6978 is a website artifact that can be viewed on your preferred internet browser.
